name: Mission: Escape from Island 2
description:
Mission: Escape from Island 2 - a sequel of the great shooter with amazing graphics! At this time, you expect more exciting plot twists, the crowds of menacing enemies and huge levels in the dangerous jungles of the island! Can you overcome all obstacles and be saved? Use weapons wisely, think over your actions, and you will do it. Good luck!


Features:
- Picturesque locations
- Exciting plot
- Plentiful enemies
- A simple game for an evening or two
